text:
@morethanmySLE @kcupjunkie Ok, @Oprah 
I’m going to educate your made for TV “Dr” about Covid19.

Yes, people die in cars, but NOT all at once.
Smoking kills, but NOT all at once.
This virus has the potential to overwhelm hospitals, infect and kill many more people.
Please make him stop the disinformation
